about_the_game:
LIO: Ultimate Edition

"LIO" is a completely free game from the very beginning to the very end.
My desire was to be able to share this product with as many people as possible, therefore i decided to not lock it behind a paywall.
However, i also wanted to leave a door open for those who believe my job is worth of a small financial support, and that's what the Ultimate Edition is for!
By purchasing the Special Edition you will unlock:

PROJECT:ONE - The Making of Lio

A 100-pages book about my philosophy and journey in the world of game development all the way up to the creation of LIO, including the full story of the game's development, pictures and insights of all kinds.

Developer Mode

Relive the game's best scenes with a series of developer only features unlocked such as Free Cam, Systems Toggle, Time Control, Realtime Statistics & much more. In addition, you will be able to read a series of exclusive comments from the developer regarding what you're seeing in that specific moment.

Character Editor

An editor to customize Lio's chromatical appearance and insert some of your personal traits.

Last but not least, you'll unlock my eternal gratitude (I know it sounds weird, but we can't pay rent with feelings, right?).
Think of this as a sort of "support the developer edition" if you want!
Warning: This DLC does NOT add anything to the main game, nor does it modify it in absolutely any way.
LIO is a free product for everyone from start to finish.
